articles.contents:

          ▾
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Miftahul Hadi
          
          
            
              Hadi have +6 months of experience as a data analyst in
              a social-tech company. Practiced experience in data
              cleaning, visualization, and analysis with R, SQL,
              Tableau, and communication. He working on personal
              projects over different cases in data analysis. Attending
              online courses and reading books to leverage my
              knowledge.
              
              “Presenting new information is
              what I love to do the most.”
